Aegis Microbe Shield: While some antimicrobial treatments block odour

Transition shoe for those wanting to move towards barefoot running

Merrell's patented midsole offers the best of both worlds- the cushioning you need for all-day comfort and the control you need for support in all kinds of terrain. They've been engineered so that each step provides the compression necessary to absorb up to four times the body's weight
